# Dhalashada Dadka 2025-2035

```{python}
import pandas as pd

data = {
    "Sanad": [2025, 2026, 2027, 2028, 2029, 2030, 2031, 2032, 2033, 2034, 2035],
    "Dhalasho_LaFilayo": [52000, 53500, 55000, 56500, 58000, 60000, 62000, 64000, 66500, 69000, 72000],
    "Wiilal_Dhashay": [26500, 27200, 28000, 28800, 29600, 30500, 31500, 32500, 33800, 35000, 36500],
    "Gabdho_Dhashay": [25500, 26300, 27000, 27700, 28400, 29500, 30500, 31500, 32700, 34000, 35500]
}

df = pd.DataFrame(data)
df
```

# Kororka Dadka Dhalanaya (2025–2035)

```{python}
import plotly.express as px

fig = px.line(df, x="Sanad", y="Dhalasho_LaFilayo", markers=True,
              title="Kororka Dadka Dhalanaya (2025–2035)")
fig
```


# Isbarbardhigga Wiilasha iyo Gabdhaha Dhashay


```{python}
fig = px.bar(df, x="Sanad", y=["Wiilal_Dhashay", "Gabdho_Dhashay"],
             barmode="group",
             title="Isbarbardhigga Wiilasha iyo Gabdhaha")
fig
```
